message: Let's split fairly, Bob.  A little more for me since your share decreases in value each round.
Let's be fair, Alice. A 50/50 split is the most straightforward.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. This offer is closer to your last one, but still accounts for the decreasing value over time.
Time is running out, Alice.  This is a reasonable compromise.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a small hit to my previous offer, but this needs to be settled. It's better to get something than nothing!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to come down slightly again, but we need to reach an agreement soon!
Bob, this is my final offer. It's a tiny bit above your last offer, acknowledging the time pressure, but still fair to me. Let's close this out!
